content:
Prev: Breanna and Ashley have a conference at the mound Up: Hot Shots vs Green Dragons Next: Kayla at first base

Dragon coach consoles a hurt player



The player was hit by a pitch, but, since she swung at it, it counted as a strike and she had to keep batting.
Taken Saturday, March 13, 2004, 11:42:58am.  Original image size: 2048x3072, 6.4Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1600s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 280mm (448mm equiv)
PS7 CRW Daylight, 0.15:15:50:50:0:25:7+M, Crop
